articles.title: 2025 Masters expert picks, best bets, odds, sleepers: Golf insider ducking Jon Rahm at Augusta National - CBS Sports
articles.description: Golf expert Sia Nejad has revealed his Masters 2025 picks and PGA best bets for Augusta National, beginning Thursday, April 10
articles.content: Along with the PGA Championship, the Masters 2025 is the only other major that gives all past winners a lifetime invitation. If you have a green jacket, then you can tee off at the 2025 Masters

articles.author: Vlada Gelman
articles.title: Casting News: Mr. Darcy and Carrie Contenders, and More - TVLine
articles.description: 'Slow Horses' actor Jack Lowden is in talks to star as Mr. Darcy in Netflix's forthcoming 'Pride and Prejudice' series, from author Dolly Alderton.
articles.content: It is a truth universally acknowledged that many actors must be in want of the role of Mr. Darcy in Netflix’s forthcoming Pride and Prejudice series — but only Jack Lowden may get the part.
